title: Drawing, "Study for Painting:  Skyscrapers", ca. 1930
signed: Signed: FD at bottom left of form
inscribed: Loose label previously glued to verso of cardboard:  GALLERIA D'ARTE CORTINA DI RENZO 20121 MILANO (ITALIA) PIAZZA CAVOUR 1 CORTINA/TEL. 667705 6595644; typed on label:  FORTUNATO DEPERO/Studio per...un' opera/1918/1925
provenance: Galleria d'arte Cortina di Renzo Cortina, Piazza Cavour 1, Milan
description: Overlapping equilateral triangles with four target shapes, flag shapes, and intersecting smaller triangles.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Study for Painting:  Skyscrapers", ca. 1930. Graphite on paper, lined. Gift of Elaine Lustig Cohen. 2000-20-14.
